amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit a point of order against measures that remove, prohibit the use of appropriated funds to implement, or make less stringent mandates established to protect human health, safety, or the environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit points of order against provisions in legislation which remove or make less stringent private sector mandates established to protect public health, safety and the environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 216 (Roll no. 16).
